data.name: Kakele Online - MMORPG
data.detailed_description:
Kakele Online - MMORPG is a 2D MMORPG! It is an old style multiplayer open world nostalgic and classic 2D pixel real time role playing game.

✔︎ Play on Mobile and PC!
✔︎ NO pay to win! NO ads! Play for FREE! Play to earn!
✔︎ Regular updates! The game is in active development with new updates every month or two!
✔︎ New redesigned pixel art graphics, sound and music coming soon!
✔︎ Customization! Customize your outfit, build your own house, upgrade your equipment!
✔︎ Play with 5 different vocations! Each vocation with unique attributes, weapons and spells!
✔︎ Persistent game world! Map items, quest puzzles and world market!
✔︎ Open PvP and Optional PvP modes available. Guilds and PvP War systems available!
✔︎ Over 200 quests and tasks to complete!
✔︎ Huge map with more than 100000 tiles, 100+ NPCs!
✔︎ Periodic dungeons bringing together all players!
✔︎ Over 20 challenging bosses to defeat and over 100 different monsters to battle against!
✔︎ Over 30 different outfits, 1000+ different equipment, potions and other items to collect!

In Kakele, you join players from all over the world to fight monsters, explore mysterious caves, complete tasks and quests, collect items and much more! Come and join our growing community for the many adventures in this indie RPG game!

data.short_description: Kakele Online - MMORPG is a 2D MMORPG! It is an old style multiplayer open world nostalgic and classic 2D pixel real time role playing game. Play on Mobile and PC! NO pay to win! NO ads! Play for FREE!
data.supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, French, Polish

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 7
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Additional Notes: OpenGL 2 and Java 8 must be supported/installed
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Hardware Accelerated
  • Additional Notes: OpenGL 2 and Java 8 must be supported/installed
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Additional Notes: OpenGL 2 and Java 8 must be supported/installed
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
